alert.note: Alert for Central and Southeast Phillips; Northern Phillips (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 30 at 8:43PM MDT by NWS Glasgow
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of north central Phillips County through 945 PM MDT... At 842 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 8 miles south of Turner to 14 miles southwest of Dodson. Movement was northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Whitewater, Dodson, Loring, Port Of Morgan, Chapman and Wagner. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Central and Southeast Phillips; Northern Phillips
